trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around June 15th 1943
divs: Sighting Details1. APPROXIMATELY 1942 TO 1944 PEOPLE WERE AFRAID TO GO OUT AT NIGHT BECAUSE OF RUMORS "THAT DOCTORS IN GREEN SUITS WITH LARGE SUNGLASSES WERE GOING AROUND IN VEHICLES KIDNAPPING PEOPLE AND EXPERIMENTING ON THEM". I BELIEVE THAT AT THE TIME PEOPLE HAD NO IDEA OF UFO'S OR ALIENS SO THAT WHAT THEY WERE DESCRIBING WAS PUT IN TERMS OF WHAT WAS LOGICAL. I WAS A YOUNG BOY AT THE TIME. MY BROTHER WHO IS 2 YEARS OLDER THAN I REMEMBERS ALSO, HAVE YOU RECEIVED REPORTS LIKE THIS FROM OTHERS? THANK YOU EDWARD KLUCKOWSKI
Summary: THIS IS AN INQUIRY TO FIND OUT IF REPORTS WERE GIVEN ABOUT THE WW 2 WAR YEARS WHEN PEOPLE WERE BEING ABDUCTED AND EXPERIMENTED ON.
